snippet.title: Arc Raiders - The Ultimate Weapons Guide | What is the BEST Weapon?
snippet.description:
If you want to be an ARC Raider you need the right tools for the job. In this video we break down every weapon in the game, how to use it effectively, and some helpful ratings to help inform your gameplay.

0:00 - Intro
0:51 - Overview & Criteria
1:36 - Weight
1:56 - Round Type & Penetration
3:31 - Efficiency
3:48 - Versatility
4:03 - Mods & Stealth
5:50 - Hairpin
6:13 - Burletta
7:07 - Anvil
8:43 - Venator
9:51 - SMGS
10:05 - Stitcher
11:17 - Bobcat
12:17 - Shotguns
12:37 - Il Toro
13:46 - Vulcano
14:55 - LMGs
15:05 - Torrente
16:30 - ARs
16:39 - Kettle
17:55 - Rattler
19:11 - Arpeggio
20:23 - Tempest
21:41 - Bettina
23:03 - Rifles
23:14 - Ferro
24:23 - Renegade
25:29 - Osprey
26:47 - Jupiter
28:36 - Hullcracker
29:54 - Equalizer
31:17 - Subscribe for More
